name: Nobody's Knight
description:
What is "Nobody's Knight"? Well, that's probably the first question you'll have as you see this page. The idea is simple, a first person adventure game focused on a mystery about a certain knight lost in a confusing world.

An adventure that will take you to different scenarios as you, the player, will discover the mysteries surrounding this knight.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S and D - Movement forward,backwards left and right

Mouse turn- Camera Movement

Mouse Right Click - Sword slash

https://twitter.com/KnightNobodys
